channel.title: Boise|Ada County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Boise|Ada County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 59AB
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 59A-B - South Eisenman Road/Memory Road.

item.title: Orchard St. South at I-84 East
item.description: Orchard St. South at I-84 East (Exit 52) to Mountain Home and Twin Falls. Orchard St. continues south as Gowen Road.

item.title: Orchard St. South at I-84
item.description: Orchard St. South at I-84 (Exit 52). Use I-84 west for Nampa and Caldwell; I-84 east for Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 46
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 46 - ID-55 North/Eagle/McCall/Emmett. ID-55 joins I-84 westbound to Nampa.

item.title: End I-184 at I-84
item.description: I-184 west approaching Exit 0, I-84 west to Nampa and I-84 east to Mountain Home. The very right lanes and very left lanes go west. This interchange is known locally as the Flying Wye.

item.title: I-184 West Approaching I-84
item.description: I-184 west approaching I-84 to Nampa and Mountain Home. Also approaching Cole Road and Franklin Road interchanges. I-184 west ends at I-84.

item.title: Curtis Road North at I-184 West (Exit 2) Onramp
item.description: Curtis Road North at I-184 West (Exit 2) Onramp to I-84, Nampa, and Twin Falls.

item.title: Curtis Road North at I-184
item.description: Curtis Road North at I-184 East to (Boise) City Center.

item.title: I-184 East / I-84 West Separation
item.description: I-184 East / I-84 West Separation. Use right lane for Franklin Road (Exit 1A) and left lane for I-184 East/City Center.

item.title: I-84 West - Nampa/Ontario
item.description: Overhead for I-84 West - Nampa/Ontario (Oregon) on I-84 just west of the I-84/I-184 junction.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 49
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 49 - I-184/Franklin Road/City Center.

item.title: End ID-21 South at I-84 in Boise
item.description: End ID-21 South at I-84 in Boise. Use right lanes for I-84 West; left lanes for I-84 East and for Gowen Road.

item.title: ID-21 West - Boise City Limit
item.description: Entering Boise on ID-21 west - Population 205, 671. Boise is the capital of Idaho and the largest city in Idaho.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West Front St. at 13th St.
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Front St.) at 13th St. After 13th St. US-20/US-26 becomes a freeway, locally known as The Connector. Use the connector for Garden City, I-84, and I-184.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West (Broadway Ave.) at Front St.
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Broadway Ave.) at Front St. Turn left on Front St. to continue west on US-20/US-26.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Broadway Ave at Front St
item.description: US-20/US-26 west (Broadway Ave.) approaching Front St. Use left lanes to continue west on US-20/US-26.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Broadway Ave Approaching Front St
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Broadway Ave.) approaching Front St. Use left lanes for Front St. These types of US shields are not at all common in Idaho. Almost all US shields are shown as solid white, not just white outlines. These signs appeared after the new bridge over the Boise River was completed here.

item.title: I-84 West Offramp at US-20/US-26 - Broadway Ave.
item.description: I-84 West Offramp at US-20/US-26 - Broadway Ave. Turn right on Broadway Ave. to continue west on US-20/US-26, Boise State University, Convention Center, and City Center. Turn left for Broadway Ave. south to Industrial Park. US-20/US-26 leaves I-84 westbound here, and rejoins I-84 in Caldwell.

item.title: I-84 West - Exits 53 and 54
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 54 - US-20/US-26/Broadway Ave. Approaching Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Boise Airport. US-20/US-26 leave I-84 here.

item.title: Begin ID-21 North at I-84
item.description: Begin ID-21 North at I-84. Use left lane for I-84 west; use right lane for Southbound Federal Way.

item.title: I-84 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-84 east. Distance to Mountain Home, Glenns Ferry, and Twin Falls.

item.title: Orchard St. South at I-84 East
item.description: Orchard St. South at I-84 East to Mountain Home and Twin Falls. Orchard St. continues south as Gowen Road.

item.title: Orchard St. South at I-84
item.description: Orchard St. South at I-84. Use I-84 west for Nampa and Caldwell; I-84 east for Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exits 53 and 52
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Boise Airport and approaching Exit 52 - Orchard St.

item.title: Broadway Ave. South at I-84
item.description: Broadway Ave. South (US-20/US-26 East) at I-84. Turn right for I-84/US-30 west to Nampa. Merge left for I-84 East/US-20/US-26/US-30 East to Mountain Home. Broadway Ave. turns into Commerce Ave. south of I-84. This interchange was redesigned as a SPUI in 2015.

item.title: Broadway Ave. South at I-84 West Onramp
item.description: Broadway Ave. South (US-20/US-26 East) at I-84 west onramp. Turn right for I-84/US-30 west to Nampa and the Boise Airport. Continue over freeway for I-84 East/US-20/US-26/US-30 East to Mountain Home.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East (Broadway Ave.) at I-84/US-30 Jct.
item.description: US-20/US-26 East (Broadway Ave.) at I-84/US-30 Jct in Boise. Turn right for I-84/US-30 West; continue over freeway for I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 East. This interchange was redesigned as a SPUI in 2015.

item.title: I-84 East (Exit 54) Offramp at Broadway Ave. (US-20/US-26)
item.description: I-84 East (Exit 54) Offramp at Broadway Ave. (US-20/US-26) in Boise. Turn left for US-20/US-26 West/Broadway Ave. to Boise State University, Convention Center, and City Center. Turn right for Industrial Park.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 54
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 54 - Broadway Ave. I-84/US-30 continues east to Mountain Home. US-20 and US-26 join I-84 eastbound here.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 53 and 54
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Boise Airport. Approaching Exit 54 - Broadway Ave.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 53
item.description: I-84 east overhead, and approaching Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Airport.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 52
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 52 - Orchard St.

item.title: I-84 East - Boise Exits
item.description: Next 3 Boise exits on I-84 east - Orchard St., Vista Ave./Air Terminal, and Broadway Ave.

item.title: I-84 East Exits 50AB
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 50A - West Overland Road. Approaching Exit 50B - Overland Road/Cole Road.

item.title: End I-184 at I-84
item.description: I-184 west approaching Exit 0, I-84 west to Nampa and I-84 east to Mountain Home. The very right lanes and very left lanes go west. This interchange is known locally as the Flying Wye.

item.title: I-184 West - Exit 1A Onramp - Approaching I-84.
item.description: I-184 West - Exit 1A Onramp. I-184 immediately ends at the top of this ramp at I-84. Use right lane for I-84 west to Nampa; left lane for I-84 east to Mountain Home.

item.title: Milwaukee St. South at Franklin Road and I-84
item.description: Milwaukee St. south at Franklin Road and I-84 onramps. Turn left on Franklin Road for I-184 East to (Boise) City Center.

item.title: I-84 West - Exits 53 and 54
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 54 - US-20/US-26/Broadway Ave. Approaching Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Boise Airport. US-20/US-26 leave I-84 here.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 57 Offramp at ID-21
item.description: I-84 East Exit 57 Offramp at ID-21. Turn left for ID-21 east to Idaho City; turn right for Gowen Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 57
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 57 - ID-21/Idaho City/Gowen Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 57
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 57 - ID-21/Idaho City/Gowen Road.

item.title: I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 East Shields
item.description: I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 east shields. Four highways join together between Boise and Mountain Home, which is the most overlaps of any stretch of highway in Idaho. Notice the US highway shields are missing the surrounding black box. This stretch of highway was recently widened, and it was probably incorrectly placed by a contractor.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 54
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 54 - Broadway Ave. I-84/US-30 continues east to Mountain Home. US-20 and US-26 join I-84 eastbound here.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 54
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 54 - Broadway Ave. Use Exit 54 for Boise State University, Old Idaho Penitentiary Historic District, Botanical Garden, and Mining and Geology Museum.

item.title: Cole Road South at I-84 East
item.description: Cole Road South at I-84 East to Mountain Home.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 East at ID-55 in Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 East at ID-55 (Eagle Road). Use ID-55 south for Meridian; use ID-55 north for Eagle and McCall. Continue east on US-20/US-26 East for Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East - Entering Boise
item.description: Entering Boise on US-20/US-26 East. Boise is the capital and largest city in Idaho.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Boise
item.description: US-20/US-26 (Chinden Blvd.) West in Boise, just west of Eagle Road.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 west at ID-55 in Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 (Chinden Blvd.) West approaching ID-55 (Eagle Road) in Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Chinden Blvd.) at ID-55 (Eagle Road) in Boise. Turn right on ID-55 north for Eagle and McCall. Turn left for ID-55 south to Meridian. Continue west for US-20/US-26 to Caldwell.

item.title: ID-55 South at US-20/US-26
item.description: ID-55 South (Eagle Road) at US-20/US-26. Turn right for US-20/US-26 west to Caldwell; left for US-20/US-26 east to Boise; straight for ID-55 south to Meridian.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Broadway Ave at Front St
item.description: US-20/US-26 west (Broadway Ave.) approaching Front St. US-20/US-26 traffic turns left on Front St. Turn right at the next light for Park Blvd. to Park Center Blvd.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Broadway Ave Approaching Front St
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Broadway Ave.) approaching Front St. US-20/US-26 traffic need to get in the left lanes to turn onto Front St.

item.title: I-84 West - Meridian Exits
item.description: Meridian Exits on I-84 west: Eagle Road (ID-55), Meridian Road (ID-69), and Ten Mile Road.

item.title: Franklin Road at I-184 West (To I-84)
item.description: Franklin Road at I-184 west. Use I-184 west To I-84, Nampa and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exits 53 and 52
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Boise Airport and approaching Exit 52 - Orchard St.

item.title: I-84 West - Exits 53 and 52
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Boise Airport and approaching Exit 52 - Orchard St. The stretch of I-84 between Broadway and Orchard St. is being widened and the interchanges at Exit 52 and Exit 53 are being redesigned. The new westbound lanes and ramps are still under construction in this photograph.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 53
item.description: I-84 east overhead, and approaching Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Airport, 1 1/2 miles. The I-84 east sign has a blue background, which is not ordinary. This interchange is currently under construction, and I am guessing the blue will be replaced with green at some point.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 52
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 52 - Orchard St. Orchard St. provides access to Gowen Field - the National Guard Base. This interchange is currently being rebuilt.

item.title: End I-184 at I-84
item.description: End I-184 on the ramp to I-84 East to Mountain Home, and I-84 west to Nampa. The control cities on this interchange was recently changed from Twin Falls and Ontario.

item.title: I-184 West - Exit 1A
item.description: I-184 west at Exit 1A - Franklin Road. Approaching I-84 to Mountain Home and Nampa.

item.title: I-184 East
item.description: I-184 east shield, just past onramp of Exit 1A.

item.title: Franklin Rd. east at I-184 East Exit 1 Onramp
item.description: Franklin Road east at I-184 east Exit 1 onramp. Use I-184 east for City Center (Boise).

item.title: Franklin Road East at I-184 East
item.description: Franklin Road East at I-184 East - Exit 1.

item.title: Fairview Ave. West at I-184
item.description: Fairview Ave. west at I-184 onramp. I-84 is posted on this sign, but it should read To I-84, since I-84 is still three miles away along I-184.

item.title: Fairview Ave. west approaching I-184
item.description: Fairview Ave. west approaching I-184 onramp.

item.title: Main St. West at US-20/US-26 West
item.description: Main St. west at US-20/US-26 junction to Garden City and Fairgrounds.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at River St.
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at River St./Bogus Basin exit. This is the last exit eastbound on the Boise Connector.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East Approaching River St.
item.description: US-20/US-26 east approaching River St. exit. US-20/US-26 east through Boise is also marked with To I-84 shields.

item.title: End I-184 East at US-20/US-26
item.description: Eastern terminus of I-184 east where US-20/US-26 merge on the freeway. There is no end I-184 marker. Distance marker for River St., 13th St., and Capitol Blvd. Only River St. is a freeway interchange. 13th St. is the end of the freeway.

item.title: I-184 East - Exit 3
item.description: I-184 east Exit 3 - Fairview Ave. I-184 continues east. This is the last I-184 shield eastbound.

item.title: I-184 East Approaching Exit 3
item.description: I-184 east approaching Exit 3 - Fairview Ave.

item.title: I-184 East - Exit 2. Approaching Exit 3
item.description: I-184 east at Exit 2 - Curtis Road. Approaching Exit 3 - Fairview Ave.

item.title: I-184 East - Exit 1A
item.description: I-184 east at Exit 1A - Franklin Road

item.title: I-84 West Exits 49 and Exits 50AB and I-184 Exit 1A
item.description: I-84/US-30 east at Exit 49 and Exit 50A-B. Use left lanes for I-184/City Center. Use middle left lane for I-184 traffic using Exit 1A - Franklin Road exit. Use middle lanes to continue on I-84 east towards Twin Falls. The right lane is for Exits 50A-B - Cole Road/Overland Road.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 49 and 50A-B
item.description: I-84/US-30 east approaching Exit 49 - I-184/City Center. Also approaching Exit 50A-B - Cole Road/Overland Road.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 49
item.description: I-84/US-30 east approaching Exit 49 - I-184/City Center. Use Exit 49, for Franklin Road access.

item.title: I-84 East Exits 49 and Exits 50AB
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 49 - I-184/City Center. Also approaching Exits 50A-B Cole Road/Overland Road. I-84 east continues towards Twin Falls and the Boise Air Terminal.

item.title: I-84 East - Boise Next 5 Exits
item.description: Boise Next 5 Exits on I-84/US-30 east.

item.title: ID-44 West - To ID-55
item.description: ID-44 west to ID-55.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Begin I-184
item.description: US-20/US-26 West at US-20/US-26/Garden City/Fairgrounds Exit. US-20/US-26 leaves the freeway here and becomes Chinden Blvd. The freeway continues as I-184.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Garden City Exit
item.description: US-20/US-26 West approaching US-20/US-26/Garden City exit. Electronic sign notification of road work on I-84 at the Broadway overpass.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West Front St. at 13th St.
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Front St.) at 13th St. After 13th St. US-20/US-26 becomes a freeway, locally known as The Connector.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at Broadway
item.description: US-20/US-26 east To I-84 on Myrtle St., at Broadway. US-20/US-26 east follows Broadway to I-84 about 2 miles south.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East - Right Lane
item.description: US-20/US-26 East (Myrtle St.) at Broadway Ave. US-20/US-26 East follows Broadway south to I-84.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East - Boise
item.description: US-20/US-26 East (Myrtle St.)/To I-84 in Boise.

item.title: ID-21 North - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker on ID-21 North to Idaho City, Lowman, and Stanley.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Federal Way
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Broadway Ave. North) at Federal Way interchange.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at Federal Way
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Broadway Ave. North) at the Federal Way interchange.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West Approaching Federal Way
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Broadway Ave. North) approaching the Federal Way interchange.

item.title: Broadway Ave. South at I-84 West Onramp
item.description: Broadway Ave. South at I-84 west offramp. US-20/US-26 leave I-84 here and follow Broadway Ave. north into Boise.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 53
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Air Terminal. Vista Ave. south goes to the Boise Airport. Vista Ave. north goes into downtown Boise.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 53
item.description: I-84 east overhead, and approaching Exit 53 - Vista Ave./Air Terminal, 1 1/2 miles.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 52
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 52 - Orchard St. Orchard St. provides access to Gowen Field - the National Guard Base.

item.title: I-84/US-30 East - Boise
item.description: I-84 and US-30 east shields in south Boise. Idaho is good at signing multiplexed highways.

item.title: I-84 East Exits 50B and 52
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 50B - Cole Rd./Overland Rd., and approaching Exit 52 - Orchard St.

item.title: I-84 East Exits 50AB
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 50A - West Overland Road. Approaching Exit 50B - Overland Road/Cole Road.

item.title: End I-184 at I-84 East
item.description: End I-184 on the ramp to I-84 East to Twin Falls. An unmarked ramp here goes to I-84 west. This interchange is known locally as the Flying Wye.

item.title: End I-184 at I-84
item.description: I-184 west approaching Exit 0, I-84 west to Nampa/Ontario and I-84 east to Twin Falls. The very right lanes and very left lanes go west. This interchange is known locally as the Flying Wye.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Caldwell on US-20/US-26 west after ID-55 junction.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 west at ID-55.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 54 Offramp at US-20/US-26
item.description: I-84 west Exit 54 US-20/US-26 offramp at Broadway Ave.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at Begin I-184
item.description: US-20/US-26 West at US-20/US-26/Garden City/Fairgrounds Exit. I-184 begins at this exit.

item.title: I-84 West - Boise Next 5 Exits
item.description: Boise Next 5 Exits on I-84 west

item.title: I-84 West Exit 54
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 54, US-20/US-26 junction to Boise City Center

item.title: I-84 West Exit 57
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 57, ID-21 to Idaho City

item.title: I-84 West Exit 59
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 59, Eisenman Road

item.title: I-84 East Exit 49
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 49 - I-184/City Center interchange. This interchange is referred to the "Flying Wye."

item.title: I-84 East Exits 49 and Exits 50AB
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 49 - I-184/City Center interchange. Also approaching Exit 50AB - Cole Road/Overland Road. Eastbound I-84 traffic has a control city of Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West Exits 49 and Exits 50AB
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 49 - I-184/City Center interchange. Also approaching Exit 50AB - Cole Road/Overland Road. Eastbound I-84 traffic has a control city of Twin Falls.
